entries.npc_1_1: Hello there. I'm in the business of selling food and have just found out my new courier might have quit. I have an important customer who has placed a large order for some specialty foods, but I won't be able to fill that order. Could you go out to them and see if they got the message from my courier?
entries.npc_2_1: Thank you for having a heart. This is where I always have the food delivered, so you should be able to find someone there you can talk to. If you see my courier, please let him know that he still has a job as long as he comes back.
entries.npc_3_1: Well, I understand. Thank you anyway.
entries.npc_4_1: An odd assortment of different meats is what they always order. And by the ton, too! Boy, they sure do go through a lot food! I wonder what they're feeding out there? Oh well! I'm just concerned that nothing's happened to my courier. Can you do this for me?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Thank you for having a heart. If you see my courier, please let him know that he still has a job as long as he comes back.
entries.npc_reset: Well, I understand. Thank you anyway.
entries.player_1_1: Sure, I'll do it for you.
entries.player_3_1: What kind of specialty food do they buy?
entries.player_reset: No. I decided to quit looking.
entries.player_sorry: I am still looking for them.
entries.waypoint_description_1: This is where a group of people have purchased large amounts of food.
